content.rendered:
Charities | Non-Profit

DISCOUNT INFORMATION

Seanmag 888 provide a discount 10% to registered non-profit organizations and registered charities.

We only require the following information to determine your eligibility:

  1. Registered name of non-profit organization or charity
  2. Registered non-profit organization or charity number
    • For customers in Australia: ABN or CAN
    • For customers in the continent of Africa: Business number/Registration for country registered.
    • For customers in UK: CRN
    • For customers in Canada:nine-digit BN/Registration number
    • For customers in U.S.:EIN number

 

As the discount can only be applied to the registered non-profit organization or charity, approved orders must be placed under our respective sales email and the company name listed as such. 

Please get in touch with our sales team at sales@saenmag888.com, where you will receive a fast response.

How will you know you are approved.

Once your organization is approved for a discount, we will contact you after we have verified all information sent via the email you either request us to contact or original email information has been received from.

What we will do after your organization is approved for a discount.

Once your organization is approved for a discount, we will email you a quote for the item(s) you are ordering, and this will include the discount.

Please note that this offer is only valid towards regular priced products and cannot be used with another promotion, discount, or promo code. It will not be applicable to sale items.

Our intention is to provide people of all ages from newborn to adults all across the globe a safe source of clean water and to sell quality medical and first aid products to charities, Not-for-profit organizations, consumers, hospitals, dentists, general practitioners and other medical facilities.

 

 

Register Your Charity or Non-Profit as a Wholesaler

<title>Charities and Not for profit - Seanmag 888</title>
<meta name="description" content="Delivering sustainable clean water solutions to communities throughout the world who suffer from water scarcity, water contamination, no water infrastructure, and lack of management is what we are striving to fix in the future. However, by purchasing Aquarius products, you can unlock the potential of an entire community and give them a chance at overcoming poverty. Seanmag 888 is going to use that money to invest in upcoming products to create long-term solutions. We are providing discounted prices for all bulk purchases for all our products from registered charities and not for profit organizations. Registered charities who can supply a tax receipt are eligible for a 5% discount towards a regular priced order attached with the already attached discount. In remote villages, the typical infrastructure necessary for water treatment is non-existent. The advantage of using our tablets allows family members to have a source of clean water." />
